title: Biden signs law mandating colleges report hazing | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Reports say Sean 'Diddy' Combs has been sued by former male employee for sexual battery. | A look at the tie between model trains and Christmas.

title: President Biden to visit New Orleans after deadly truck attack
shortDescription: President Biden and first lady Biden will visit New Orleans on Monday to grieve with family members of victims from the city's New Year's Day attack.

title: Biden blocks Japanese takeover of US Steel
shortDescription: In blocking the sale to Nippon Steel, Biden said U.S. Steel "will remain a proud American company – one that’s American-owned and American-operated."

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to pause TikTok ban | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Debate picks up steam between Trump supporters over the role of immigrant labor and US workers. Bald eagle is finally named as national bird.

title: Live updates: Mike Johnson fights to keep his job as vote begins
shortDescription: All eyes are on House Speaker Mike Johnson, R-La., on Friday as the lower chamber holds a high-stakes vote to choose its leader.

title: Daily Briefing: The 119th Congress convenes
shortDescription: Task one: A pivotal House speaker vote. Here is the news to know on Friday.

title: Will Speaker Mike Johnson lose his job? Pivotal House vote looms.
shortDescription: At least one Republican has said he won't vote for Johnson, leaving no room for error in Friday's vote.

title: What to expect from the next two years in Congress
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump is expected to throw his weight around to get things done on the Hill.

title: Efforts to arrest impeached South Korean president called off after standoff
shortDescription: Officials called off the effort to arrest impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol on Friday due to concerns over the safety of its personnel.

title: Biden honors Jan. 6 committee leader Liz Cheney
shortDescription: President Joe Biden awarded the Presidential Citizens Medal to former Rep. Liz Cheney and Rep. Bennie Thompson, who led the Jan. 6 committee.

title: Biden highlights 235 federal judge confirmations
shortDescription: President Joe Biden celebrated 235 federal judge confirmations during his term, noting the confirmations are "all about preserving the Constitution."

title: Trump blames 'radical Islamic terrorism' on 'open borders'
shortDescription: Amid a fast-moving investigation, President-elect Donald Trump appeared to blame the New Orleans attack on immigration.

title: Trump to hold 'victory rally' in Washington ahead of Inauguration Day
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump is holding a "victory rally" at Washington's Capitol One Arena the day before Inauguration Day.

title: Trump target Liz Cheney receives medal from Biden
shortDescription: The 20 awards recipients include Americans who fought for marriage equality, an Army nurse during the Vietnam War, and a war correspondent.

title: How many days until Donald Trump's inauguration? What to know
shortDescription: Inauguration Day is less than three weeks away, here is what you need to know ahead of President-elect Trump's inauguration.

title: Biden: Feds probe possible link between Vegas blast, New Orleans assault
shortDescription: President Joe Biden told the nation that federal authorities are looking into a possible link between deadly incidents in Las Vegas and New Orleans.

title: Donald Trump will attend Jimmy Carter's funeral
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump said at a New Year's event at Mar-a-Lago that he will attend former President Jimmy Carter's funeral.
